result.eng: It happened at the end of the last century.
result.ga: Tharla sé ag deireadh an chéid seo caite
result.orig: Tharla sé ag deireadh an chéid seo caite
result.html: Tharla sé ag deireadh an chéid seo caiteIt happened at the end of the last century.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla sé ag deireaḋ an ċéid seo caiteIt happened at the end of the last century.

result.eng: They came back at the end of the summer.
result.ga: Tháinig siad ar ais ag deireadh an tsamhraidh
result.orig: Tháinig siad ar ais ag deireadh an tsamhraidh
result.html: Tháinig siad ar ais ag deireadh an tsamhraidhThey came back at the end of the summer.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig siad ar ais ag deireaḋ an tsaṁraiḋThey came back at the end of the summer.

result.eng: The abandoned soldier continued fighting until the end.
result.ga: Lean an saighdiúir tréigthe ag troid go dtí an deireadh
result.orig: Lean an saighdiúir tréigthe ag troid go dtí an deireadh
result.html: Lean an saighdiúir tréigthe ag troid go dtí an deireadhThe abandoned soldier continued fighting until the end.
result.ponchtml: Lean an saiġdiúir tréigṫe ag troid go dtí an deireaḋThe abandoned soldier continued fighting until the end.

result.eng: It will be over before long.
result.ga: Beidh deireadh leis sul i bhfad
result.orig: Beidh deireadh leis sul i bhfad
result.html: Beidh deireadh leis sul i bhfadIt will be over before long.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ deireaḋ leis sul i ḃfadIt will be over before long.

result.eng: I had to end that madness.
result.ga: Bhí orm deireadh a chur leis an amaidí sin
result.orig: Bhí orm deireadh a chur leis an amaidí sin
result.html: Bhí orm deireadh a chur leis an amaidí sinI had to end that madness.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí orm deireaḋ a ċur leis an amaidí sinI had to end that madness.

result.eng: What did you do at the weekend?
result.ga: Cad a rinne tú ag an deireadh seachtaine
result.orig: Cad a rinne tú ag an deireadh seachtaine
result.html: Cad a rinne tú ag an deireadh seachtaineWhat did you do at the weekend?
result.ponchtml: Cad a rinne tú ag an deireaḋ seaċtaineWhat did you do at the weekend?

result.eng: That event put and end to the night.
result.ga: Chuir an eachtra sin deireadh leis an oíche
result.orig: Chuir an eachtra sin deireadh leis an oíche
result.html: Chuir an eachtra sin deireadh leis an oícheThat event put and end to the night.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir an eaċtra sin deireaḋ leis an oíċeThat event put and end to the night.

result.eng: Is this the end of the film?
result.ga: An é seo deireadh an scannáin
result.orig: An é seo deireadh an scannáin
result.html: An é seo deireadh an scannáinIs this the end of the film?
result.ponchtml: An é seo deireaḋ an scannáinIs this the end of the film?

result.eng: No matter how long the night, the morning will come at the end.
result.ga: Dá fhad an oíche tiocfaidh an mhaidin ar deireadh
result.orig: Dá fhad an oíche tiocfaidh an mhaidin ar deireadh
result.html: Dá fhad an oíche tiocfaidh an mhaidin ar deireadhNo matter how long the night, the morning will come at the end.
result.ponchtml: Dá ḟad an oíċe tiocfaiḋ an ṁaidin ar deireaḋNo matter how long the night, the morning will come at the end.

result.eng: You don't need to wait till the end.
result.ga: Ní gá duit fanacht go dtí an deireadh
result.orig: Ní gá duit fanacht go dtí an deireadh
result.html: Ní gá duit fanacht go dtí an deireadhYou don't need to wait till the end.
result.ponchtml: Ní gá duit fanaċt go dtí an deireaḋYou don't need to wait till the end.

result.eng: That's the end of the story, my friends.
result.ga: Sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairde
result.orig: Sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairde
result.html: Sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairdeThat's the end of the story, my friends.
result.ponchtml: Sin deireaḋ leis an scéal a ċairdeThat's the end of the story, my friends.

result.eng: And we will be playing in the Tír na nÓg and Sláinte pubs in Manhattan this weekend.
result.ga: Agus beidh muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireadh seachtaine seo
result.orig: Agus beidh muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireadh seachtaine seo
result.html: Agus beidh muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireadh seachtaine seoAnd we will be playing in the Tír na nÓg and Sláinte pubs in Manhattan this weekend.
result.ponchtml: Agus beiḋ muid ag casaḋ sna tiṫe táḃairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireaḋ seaċtaine seoAnd we will be playing in the Tír na nÓg and Sláinte pubs in Manhattan this weekend.

result.eng: There are a couple of pubs there, and there are often music sessions on at the weekend.
result.ga: Tá cúpla teach tábhairne ann agus bíonn seisiúin cheoil ar siúl ag an deireadh seachtaine
result.orig: Tá cúpla teach tábhairne ann agus bíonn seisiúin cheoil ar siúl ag an deireadh seachtaine
result.html: Tá cúpla teach tábhairne ann agus bíonn seisiúin cheoil ar siúl ag an deireadh seachtaineThere are a couple of pubs there, and there are often music sessions on at the weekend.
result.ponchtml: Tá cúpla teaċ táḃairne ann agus bíonn seisiúin ċeoil ar siúl ag an deireaḋ seaċtaineThere are a couple of pubs there, and there are often music sessions on at the weekend.

result.eng: [Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.
result.ga: Sin Úna sin Niamh Ansin Muiris tá seisean i lár báire Ansin Fiona agus mise ar deireadh
result.orig: Sin Úna sin Niamh Ansin Muiris tá seisean i lár báire Ansin Fiona agus mise ar deireadh
result.html: Sin Úna sin Niamh Ansin Muiris tá seisean i lár báire Ansin Fiona agus mise ar deireadh[Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.
result.ponchtml: Sin Úna sin Niaṁ Ansin Muiris tá seisean i lár báire Ansin Fiona agus mise ar deireaḋ[Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.

result.eng: What do you usually do at the weekend?
result.ga: Céard a dhéanann tú ag an deireadh seachtaine de ghnáth
result.orig: Céard a dhéanann tú ag an deireadh seachtaine de ghnáth
result.html: Céard a dhéanann tú ag an deireadh seachtaine de ghnáthWhat do you usually do at the weekend?
result.ponchtml: Céard a ḋéanann tú ag an deireaḋ seaċtaine de ġnáṫWhat do you usually do at the weekend?

result.eng: And what about the rest of the weekend?
result.ga: Agus céard faoin gcuid eile den deireadh seachtaine
result.orig: Agus céard faoin gcuid eile den deireadh seachtaine
result.html: Agus céard faoin gcuid eile den deireadh seachtaineAnd what about the rest of the weekend?
result.ponchtml: Agus céard faoin gcuid eile den deireaḋ seaċtaineAnd what about the rest of the weekend?

result.eng: Does Maria go to Dublin every weekend?
result.ga: An dtéann Maria go Baile Átha Cliath gach deireadh seachtaine
result.orig: An dtéann Maria go Baile Átha Cliath gach deireadh seachtaine
result.html: An dtéann Maria go Baile Átha Cliath gach deireadh seachtaineDoes Maria go to Dublin every weekend?
result.ponchtml: An dtéann Maria go Baile Áṫa Cliaṫ gaċ deireaḋ seaċtaineDoes Maria go to Dublin every weekend?

result.eng: I usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.
result.ga: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.orig: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.html: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aerI usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.
result.ponchtml: Téim ar ẛiúlóidí fada de ġnáṫ ag an deireaḋ seaċtaine is breá liom ḃeiṫ amuiġ faoin aerI usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.

result.eng: There are three letters at the end of each file name to indicate what type of file it is.
result.ga: Bíonn trí litir ag deireadh ainm gach comhaid chun a chur in iúl cén cineál comhaid atá ann
result.orig: Bíonn trí litir ag deireadh ainm gach comhaid chun a chur in iúl cén cineál comhaid atá ann

result.eng: But that was not the end of the story.
result.ga: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéil
result.orig: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéil
result.html: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéilBut that was not the end of the story.
result.ponchtml: Aċ níorḃ ẛin é deireaḋ an scéilBut that was not the end of the story.

result.eng: Is citizen journalism finished?

result.eng: By the end of the 17th century slave ownership was ended in Europe.
result.ga: Faoi dheireadh an 17ú haois bhí deireadh le húinéireacht sclábhaithe san Eoraip
result.orig: Faoi dheireadh an 17ú haois bhí deireadh le húinéireacht sclábhaithe san Eoraip

result.ponchtml: Faoi ḋeireaḋ an 17ú haois ḃí deireaḋ le húinéireaċt scláḃaiṫe san EoraipBy the end of the 17th century slave ownership was ended in Europe.

result.eng: By the year 1776 slavery was ended in many of the northern states.
result.ga: Faoin mbliain 1776 bhí deireadh le sclábhaíocht i roinnt de na stáit thuaidh
result.orig: Faoin mbliain 1776 bhí deireadh le sclábhaíocht i roinnt de na stáit thuaidh
result.html: Faoin mbliain 1776 bhí deireadh le sclábhaíocht i roinnt de na stáit thuaidhBy the year 1776 slavery was ended in many of the northern states.

result.eng: As soon as one grows up, the fun is over.

result.eng: This must be the end of the world.
